A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't get past the ridiculous Leia\, flying and not dead\, through outer space.  One of the dumbest things I have ever seen\, and shameful for this movie.  I thought Luke would be a powerful Jedi in full control of the force\, like Yoda\, but he is a weak little baby?  Shameful again.  Enough with the jokes already.  Shame.........ding-ding-ding\,.......... SHAME!
